discussion.p: A program should not be allowed to add specialization of class templates unary_function and binary_function, in force of /1. If a program were allowed to specialize these templates, the library could no longer rely on them to provide the intended typedefs or there might be other undesired interactions.
discussion.blockquote: Accepting issue would resolve this issue as NAD editorial.
Accepting n3145 would resolve this issue as NAD editorial.
discussion.p:
Previous proposed resolution:
Change paragraph /1 as follows:
1 The following classes class templates are provided to simplify the typedefs of the argument and result types:. A program shall not declare specializations of these templates.
